modName: Black Scaled Armor Bandit Pack Standalone
summary: ---Black Scaled Armor by Karim (Now standalone and upgradeable) With 4 different armors to make. Works with all races and and genders. Let me know if you see a problem.
descriptionHtml:
Black Scaled Bandit Armor Standalone Karim and draco1122

---Black Scaled Armor by Karim (Now standalone and upgradeable) With 4 different armors to make. Works with all races and and genders. Let me know if you see a problem.

Shot me some pic\'s of your characters.

---Updated 1.2 09/14/12 Finished female version should be all there.
---Updated 1.1 09/13/12 With retexture standalone on all bandit versions. 4 different armor types.

-Karim gave me permission to make his armor standalone so here it is. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22961 Please endorse his mod as well. He made the textures.

----Four Different armors now Black Sleeved Scale Armor, Black Scaled Armor, Black Scale Half Armor, Black Scaled Wolf Hide armor.

-----Armor is under studded leather at the forge. Armor stats:
Light
Chest base 37
Gloves base 11
Boots base 11
helm 13


Install: Use NMM or unzip to data folder and check mod to activate.


Hope you all enjoy.



My other mods
Draco1122


Castle Draco ----- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12792
Blood Jagged Crown ---- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12890
Free camera movement jarls thrones ---- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13548
Longer potions ---- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13841
HD Thalmor recolor pack ---- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3939
Forest green - brown imperial retexture --- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20089
Draco powerful artifacts and enchants http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20197/
Restoration Lesser powers and spells---- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20813
Golden dwemer ruins--- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20932
Skyrim crash prevention Tutorial Guide http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21392
author: Karim and draco1122
